name: Rest-Pause + Drop Sets (~12 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 1 extended drop set ~2 min; for multiple sets + short rests => ~12 min total
overview_and_execution: Pick a weight for ~8 reps to failure, rest 15s, drop 10–15%, do max reps, rest 15s, drop another 10–15%, do max reps. Increase starting weight once you exceed 10 reps on first set.
example_application: Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 50 lbs x 8 reps to failure, rest 15s, drop to 40 lbs x AMRAP, rest 15s, drop to 30 lbs x AMRAP. If initial set hits 10 reps, start with 55 lbs next time.
important_notes: Very taxing. Use deload if you can’t progress or feel excessively fatigued.
